nodes.text: B'hob's Discount Superweapons was a shop owned by an individual called B'hob. Various Imperial superweapons were sold at the shop, including the Galaxy Gun, the Tarkin, the Death Stars, and the World Devastators. It also planned to have the DarkSaber and Starbuster appear as products. In addition to its superweapon offerings, the vendor also sold Super Star Destroyers, including the Eclipse and the Executor.
